text: These are things named after Anatoliy Skorokhod (1930-2011), a Ukrainian mathematician. == Skorokhod == * Skorokhod space * Skorokhod integral * Skorokhod problem == Skorokhod's == * Skorokhod's theorem: ** Skorokhod's embedding theorem ** Skorokhod's representation theorem Skorokhod
title: List of things named after Anatoliy Skorokhod
